name: PERONii Solutions
tag_list: south-africa, cape-town, web-design, development, online-marketing, ppc, email-marketing
overview:
PERONii specialises in website development and online marketing.

The company has been established well in Cape Town and has become a well known industry player.

PERONii provides PHP/MySQL based solutions, ranging from basic to large scale web based solutions.

These solutions include anything from a static site, to blogs (WordPress), to e-commerce applications.

Our aim is always to build goal driven solutions that can be quantified with real time analytics and conversion metrics.

Our online marketing solutions range from pay-per-click campaign management and general search engine optimisation to social media marketing and email marketing (conventional newsletters or viral campaigns).

We are pro open source and develop mostly on the cakePHP rapid development framework.

We do a lot of outsource work for companies in the UK, Australia, New Zealand and South Africa of course.
